div.p: ANTONIO: As we saw earlier, most people believe they have some risk for heart disease.
MICHELLE: Right. And most people believe they have heart disease or cancer, not alcoholism or drug addiction.
ANTONIO: So who would most people say does develop alcoholism?
MICHELLE: Good question. Most often we hear, "Not me!"
ANTONIO: Well that narrows it down a bit!
MICHELLE: Yeah, It's the type of problem we think happens to someone else. And that someone else probably doesn't believe they'll develop it either.
ANTONIO: Okay Michelle, time to get a straight answer. Our next exercise explores common views about the traits associated with alcoholism.
ANTONIO: What kind of person do most people think develops alcoholism?
ANTONIO: Keep in mind, we are not asking what kind of person you think develops alcoholism, we're asking you what you think most people would say.
